channel.title: Do not addGlobalObject if an object is already their?

item.title: Do not addGlobalObject if an object is already their?
item.dc:creator: @SnowBoarder7 SnowBoarder7
item.description:
@SnowBoarder7 wrote:

Is there a way to make it so if an object is already occupying the space to not addGlobalObject?
I was thinking something like:

NewObjects(){
if(objectAtCoords(x, y) == null){
addGlobalObject();
}else{
if(objectAtCoords(x, y) <= 0){
addGlobalObject();
}
}

But thatâ€™s just pseudocode, so is there a way to do something like this? I very much need it.
Thanks!

Read full topic
